TypeSignature.Value: public delegate uint MirroringDelegate(UnicodeFunctions ufuncs, uint unicode);
.class public auto ansi sealed MirroringDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The Unicode code point to query.
Docs.summary: A callback delegate used to retrieve the mirrored glyph of a Unicode code point for bidirectional text rendering.
Docs.returns: The mirrored Unicode code point, or the original code point if no mirroring is defined.
